about.name: The following questions are from real DMV written tests. These are some of the actual permit questions you will face in California. Each permit practice test question has three answer choices. Select one answer for each question and select "grade this section." You can find this button at the bottom of the drivers license quiz.  For a complete list of questions and answers for California please visit https://cheat-sheets.dmv-written-test.com/en/california/car.

hasPart.name: As the percentage of alcohol (BAC) in your blood increases, you become:

hasPart.assesses: As the percentage of alcohol (BAC) in your blood increases, you become: | As the percentage of alcohol (BAC) in your blood increases, you become: -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: Blood alcohol concentration (BAC) is a measure of the percentage of alcohol in a person's blood. The higher the BAC, the more impaired a person is.

comment.text: More intoxicated.
More sober.
More coordinated.
More intoxicated.

answerExplanation.text: Blood alcohol concentration (BAC) is a measure of the percentage of alcohol in a person's blood. The higher the BAC, the more impaired a person is.

comment.text: As the percentage of alcohol (BAC) in your blood increases, you become: | Blood alcohol concentration (BAC) is a measure of the percentage of alcohol in a person's blood. The higher the BAC, the more impaired a person is.

hasPart.text: If there is danger, you may need to sound a sharp blast on your horn. Do this when a child or any other pedestrian is about to enter into the street in front of your moving vehicle.

suggestedAnswer.text: Start to prepare to slow down.

suggestedAnswer.text: Sound a sharp blast of your horn.

acceptedAnswer.text: Sound a sharp blast of your horn.

hasPart.name: When you see a flashing yellow light at an intersection, you should:

about.name: When you see a flashing yellow light at an intersection, you should:

hasPart.assesses: When you see a flashing yellow light at an intersection, you should: | When you see a flashing yellow light at an intersection, you should: -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: A flashing yellow light at an intersection indicates that drivers should slow to a safe and reasonable speed and proceed with caution.

suggestedAnswer.text: Yield to all traffic before crossing the intersection.

comment.text: Yield to all traffic before crossing the intersection.

suggestedAnswer.text: Stop, then enter the intersection when it is safe to do so.

comment.text: Stop, then enter the intersection when it is safe to do so.

suggestedAnswer.text: Slow down and cross the intersection carefully.

comment.text: Slow down and cross the intersection carefully.

acceptedAnswer.text: Slow down and cross the intersection carefully.

comment.text: Slow down and cross the intersection carefully.

answerExplanation.text: A flashing yellow light at an intersection indicates that drivers should slow to a safe and reasonable speed and proceed with caution.

comment.text: When you see a flashing yellow light at an intersection, you should: | A flashing yellow light at an intersection indicates that drivers should slow to a safe and reasonable speed and proceed with caution.

hasPart.text: Regulatory signs provide notice to road users of traffic laws and must be obeyed. Where this sign is posted, making a right turn is prohibited.

comment.text: No right turn.
No U-turns.
No left turn.
No right turn.

answerExplanation.text: Regulatory signs provide notice to road users of traffic laws and must be obeyed. Where this sign is posted, making a right turn is prohibited.

hasPart.text: If your vehicle is equipped with a lap belt and a separate shoulder belt, you are required to use both.

suggestedAnswer.text: Only required to use the lap belt.

comment.text: Only required to use the lap belt.

suggestedAnswer.text: Required to use both the lap and shoulder belts.

comment.text: Required to use both the lap and shoulder belts.

suggestedAnswer.text: Only required to use the shoulder belt.

comment.text: Only required to use the shoulder belt.

acceptedAnswer.text: Required to use both the lap and shoulder belts.

comment.text: Required to use both the lap and shoulder belts.

answerExplanation.text: If your vehicle is equipped with a lap belt and a separate shoulder belt, you are required to use both.
